text: Synval Silva (Juiz de Fora, March 14, 1911 – Rio de Janeiro, April 14, 1994) was a singer and Brazilian composer. Its main successes were recorded by Carmen Miranda. == References == ==External links== * * Synval Silva at the Dicionário Cravo Albin da Música Popular Brasileira Category:1911 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Brazilian composers Category:People from Minas Gerais Category:20th-century composers
title: Synval Silva
